title: The United States Fact Book
description: Trying to gather all of the information on the individual states of the USA is a time-consuming job, so we thought that we would help. If you are a student, researcher, or just interested in America, this is the prefect reference resource for you. Containing information such as state size, population, bird, flower, date of entrance into the Union, flag song, and much more, this is truly an easy to use and informative book, full of fascinating facts and history.
author: Richard S. Hartmetz
